data.description:
Discover Culture in VR: Experience museums, galleries, heritage sites, and concerts from around the world in virtual reality, all from the comfort of your living room with Atopia!

Atopia is your gateway to an ever-expanding universe of cultural experiences. We've given renowned real-world institutions a new virtual home, where you can explore art in all its forms.

Early Access Beta:
Please note that Atopia is currently in the Beta/Early Access phase. Some features are still under development, and you may encounter a few bugs along the way - if you want to support us on improving and join our community of Gen-1 Atopians, please be welcome to our Discord Beta Server: https://discord.gg/9xpqWqUP 

What's Already Available:
* Explore a growing collection of diverse cultural experiences.
* Enjoy a selection of pre-access experiences.
* Immerse yourself in art with our audio guides for selected pieces.

What's Coming Next:
* Connect with your Ready Player Me Avatar and interact with fellow Atopia users on both PC and Quest platforms.
* Purchase tickets to world-famous shows and events through our integrated ticket shop, and acquire virtual or real art pieces from galleries worldwide.
* Build your own immersive art experiences from our no-code web builder.
* Take control of your social interactions with friends lists, invitations, group systems, and moderation tools.
* Receive personalized experience recommendations from Atopia.
